original_title: Ex-President Mahinda’s Chief Security Officer Neville Wanniarachchi brought to Bribery Commission
original_body_lines: The Chief Security Officer of former President Mahinda Rajapaksa, Neville Wanniarachchi has been brought to the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC).
He is currently being questioned by officers attached to the Bribery Commission.
